<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Bracers of Missile Deflection](/Equipment.aspx?ID=417)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 607 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn bracers

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These bracers are made from plates of durable mithral and gleam like the summer sun.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Bracers of Missile Deflection (Greater)

<traits>

</traits>

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the bracers once every 10 minutes.
